property.name: hadoop.webdav.bind.address
property.description: The address or hostname for binding the webdav service listener.

property.name: hadoop.webdav.port
property.description: The port for binding the webdav service listener.

property.name: hadoop.webdav.server.kerberos.principal
property.description: The Kerberos principal used by WebDAV for accessing HDFS. This user should be set up for secure impersonation.

property.name: hadoop.webdav.server.kerberos.keytab
property.description: The Kerberos keytab file with the credentials for the principal used by WebDAV for accessing HDFS.
